website_summaries.verdict: Given the low price, this growler performs remarkably well. Classy packaging and a colorful selection of lid bands makes this an ideal gift for casual craft beer lovers or outdoor enthusiasts.
pros: Double-walled, vacuum-insulated, stainless steel construction maintains craft beer carbonation and temperature for up to 6 hours
Keeps other liquids cold for up to 24 hours or hot for up to 12 hours
The colorful lid bands are a nice touch that allows users to customize their growlers
Available in a variety of fun colors
cons: The strap that secures the lid to the bottle could be sturdier
Without a handle, it's awkward to hold and carry

customer_reviews.title: Military approved!!
customer_reviews.text: Loving my new bottle. I considered some of the other more common brands, but when I found 45 degree and saw the price, there was no hesitation. The quality feels very sturdy and the black matte finish is gorgeous. I'm in the military, and wanted something I could lug around all day and not have to worry about damage or scratching a stainless steel finish. I really like that different colored bands for the cap were included. Even though I plan on keeping the black, I like that I have the option later if my wife decides to use my bottle. I added a Texas sticker cause everything is bigger, even our water bottles.
customer_reviews.author: jacob cortez

customer_reviews.title: I settled on this brand after finding out this company has a fantastic warranty and minimal complaints of rusting occurring inside
customer_reviews.text: I spend a long time doing research on these type of containers/bottles. I settled on this brand after finding out this company has a fantastic warranty and minimal complaints of rusting occurring inside. I waited a few days before I'd review this so I could fully test it out. I'd recommend this bottle so far. The ice appears to be retained well past the 24 hours. No rust spots have been found and top cover seems to be holding well even after my cat chewed on it.
customer_reviews.author: christian Galvan

customer_reviews.title: Kept things cold and carbonated for a couple of days.
customer_reviews.text: I went to get a fill at my local brewery and the carbonation caused the beer to leak all over my car. I made sure the lid was tight, but I could see bubbles of beer coming from the lid. It did keep things cold, but it looks like I will not be able to use this for beer. Review Edit: I have upped my review after the company contacted me and sent me a new lid. With the new lid the growler was able to keep carbonation for a few days.
customer_reviews.author: steph

customer_reviews.title: I've sropped this thing twice since ive had it (it's ...
customer_reviews.text: I've sropped this thing twice since ive had it (it's not the easiest to carry when full) and each time i've freaked out and each time barely anything happened to it (there's a scuff from sliding a few inches on concrete). I dont know how long it stays cols and or supposed to stay cold, because I don't really care. However, when its below freezing, and things in my truck freeze (water bottles, milk, hair oil) the water in this thing doesn't. +1 for you, bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Khandaq

customer_reviews.title: I'll definitely be taking this down to my local brewery to fill up with my favorite brew (Railyard 400)
customer_reviews.text: I filled it up with ice and water this morning and, now, as I type this it is still frosty cold and full of ice cubes. I'll definitely be taking this down to my local brewery to fill up with my favorite brew (Railyard 400). It'll also be great for summertime camping and fireworks because who doesn't hate warm drinks. Even though I knew it was a 64oz growler, the size of it did take me by surprise. Be prepared for it. I've included a picture next to a standard beer bottle for comparison.
customer_reviews.author: PAPASTAG

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing bottle!!! Hold 1/2 gallon of water and keeps it cool. I use reusable ice cubs in it as well to keep the water even colder for longer. I am an archaeologist and out on digs in the hot weather with this bottle even sitting in direct sunlight the water stays cool inside. Only down fall is that the bottle outside can get a bit warm, not sure if that's just because I have a black one and it soaks up heat, while a white one wouldn't as much, but honestly not a big concern for me. I love that I can fill it and even 24 hours afterwards it is still cold water to drink!
customer_reviews.author: K.Stanford

customer_reviews.title: Product rusts - think twice before purchasing
customer_reviews.text: I too purchased this bottle and literally within 2-3 days of use, small rust patches had already formed on the top of the bottle. I wiped them off and proceeded to use the bottle, and now about two weeks in, for the past two days, I have had a strong metallic taste in my mouth after drinking water from the bottle throughout the day. While I love that it keeps the drink cold all day, if you are tasting rust, this is not a usable product. I am quite disgusted that they would market something, i.e., stainless steel, that is apparently a complete lie.
customer_reviews.author: Yours Truly

customer_reviews.title: One of my most useful purchases.
customer_reviews.text: My results are similar to others. If you you put some refrigirated water with ice into the growler at 8AM, the ice will still be there at 8PM. Other reviewers have written that there will still be ice for even longer. My water never lasts that long, so I cannot comment. The size is great for carrying it with you and drinking it throughout the day. I would recommend purchasing a carrying sleeve. It can get pretty heavy when full. The price is cheap when you consider how durable it is and how many uses it has.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Good manufactured product with good purpose driven company standing behind it.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice vacuum insulated 64 oz water bottle. Nicely packaged (reminds me of an Apple product) and as an extra nice touch you can put one of 6 or so different colored 'rubber' decorative bands around the lid of the bottle to personalize it a bit more. Good satisfaction email follow up and good performance to date. I also bought the cloth carrying bag that fits this bottle very well and is quite handy. Overall a good product. I use this on day long trips as a refill bottle for a smaller water bottle that I have.
customer_reviews.author: Super Dad

customer_reviews.title: Purchased Two
customer_reviews.text: Ok my daughter bought me one these a year ago for Father's Day and it has been great. I just bought a second a few weeks ago and took both to my local brewery ( Altamont Beer Works) . My original worked fine. My new one leaked pretty bad. They sold me a new cap for $6.50 and it worked fine. The guy at the counter tried to reseal the original twice and it always failed. I suspect this is an issue with the original cap gasket being a bit too narrow. Given that they have a supply of growler caps for sale, I suspect they see this a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Gadget

customer_reviews.title: Not the quality it once was.
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying these bottles for years now with no problems, however the bottle I received yesterday already appears to have rust spots on the inside of the bottle despite having only been washed. I'm incredibly disappointed as until now this has been a great working and affordable alternative to the more expensive brands.
customer_reviews.author: HerrMetzger

customer_reviews.title: I was satisfied with the HydroFlask so just went to buy another ...
customer_reviews.text: I needed another insulated growler for a party. I already had a HydroFlask. I was satisfied with the HydroFlask so just went to buy another until I saw the price about 40% higher than I paid about a year ago. I then saw the 45 Degree Latitude for about the price I paid for my HydroFlask and the reviews looked decent so ordered at 8PM Thursday and received it on Friday! I did see some say the HydroFlask insulated better so I added equal amounts of water and ice to both bottles. Waited 24 hours to take a peek and both had similar amounts of ice left. For the price difference and equal performance this is a no-brainer.
customer_reviews.author: Michael B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised - 64 ounce capacity, tight seal, keep my mandatory cold water COLD. Plus - very easy to make sure I get my daily water intake: 1 bottle is perfect. Also, really like the colored bands to identify (or, as my friend says accessorize) . Got the tote too - fits like a glove, and I really like the short loop to help lift, or attach a carabiner for other things. Hindsight, which has nothing to do with the product, is that a straw would have been a smart purchase, because note, when full, it's like 4 pounds. I think I'm going to purchase a long metal straw, and attach.
customer_reviews.author: Briana H.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Had an issue with the rubber ring around the top coming off. Spoke to customer service who sent several rubber rings in the mail! Would buy again! Use it every day for work
customer_reviews.author: Trent

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: Look no further. This is it. The price for my bottle was so inexpensive compared to other brands and it is great. Mine came with different colored bands you can put around the top cap. Also- the material they used to make the cap and cap leash thing is strong enough to endure the weight of 64oz being pulled on it. Solid work. Overall- my water intake has increased and it's easy to keep large amounts of water with me and whatever temperature I need. I haven't been lucky enough to use it as a growler for beer (yet). But update my review if there is a failure
customer_reviews.author: JunieCakes

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many different water bottles, including double wall insulated, etc. and this is my favorite thus far. The extra large size holds the right amount of liquid for my purposes. I haven't tested hot liquids yet, but it keeps cold liquids cold as advertised. It is the exact same type of bottle as a Hydro Flask (and all of the others of this style out there), but for much less money. There is no need to buy the "name brand" when this bottle exists alongside and works just as well. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: A. Jacques

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bottle.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent bottle... I take water everywhere with me... and it stays cool for a lot longer than their predicted claim! ... make sure you are thoughtful about closing the lid... it's easy, in a rush, to not properly close it... or so my car found out. Anywho- say no to plastic and hello to the only bottle you need!
customer_reviews.author: b

customer_reviews.title: Watch out for rust!
customer_reviews.text: We bought 2 of these bottles, we thought they looked awesome and were excited to use them! Unfortunately, mouth on both of the bottle got rust all over within a week of use! So much for stainless steel! Maybe we were unlucky to get 2 lemons, but we'll be certainly looking for other bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Fairy

customer_reviews.title: Water stays cold forever
customer_reviews.text: Nice and big, it keeps water cold for a very long time. Great for taking to work when you work on an airfield where all of the water tastes like jet fuel so you have to bring your own to last all day.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.andMrs.MorenoTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Great bottle with only one complaint
customer_reviews.text: The water bottle is great. Keeps my drinks cold all day when I'm outside in this Las Vegas heat. My only complaint is the piece that connects the lid to the bottle broke after only 3 weeks of using it. Since that was how I normally carried my bottle, I'm going to have to figure something else out.
customer_reviews.author: Jess A.

customer_reviews.title: Works like a champ
customer_reviews.text: Works like a champ. It's a large beast, but take it to the gym and try to finish 2 a day. You can put ice in it and still have ice a day and half later. If you fill with hot water, it would be days later before it cools down. Worth every penny,
customer_reviews.author: Kenny Garrison

customer_reviews.title: Son loved it
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a Xmas gift for my beer-loving son. It seems very sturdy and perfect for traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this bottle for only a few days and I love it! Packaging and presentation was excellent. The bottle has a very nice solid, high quality look and feel to it. The other day I had filled it with ice and water before bed and almost 24 hours later, some of the ice still hadn't melted! I love my water too and this allows me to not have to refill as much. The wider mouth opening also makes it a lot easier to put ice in. 10/10!!
customer_reviews.author: iflyimpilot

customer_reviews.title: They work great, and definitely beat glass growlers for camping or ...
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered two, and will probably order more. I was a little hesitant to order at first, considering the price difference between this and the competition. (a 64oz Hydro Flask is twice the price). They work great, and definitely beat glass growlers for camping or far away brewery trips. Plus, I can leave a backup in my car without worry about it breaking.
customer_reviews.author: nlong

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic SS Growler sized container
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic SS Growler sized container!! Love it! Keep my soup for two warm all day; cold beer ready whenever I want; water for all-day activity. This beast does it all and more! Very well built, durable, overall stoked about this SS Growler!!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Buckner

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Initially I wanted to buy a Hydro Flask but it was $60+ so I went with this cheaper option. Got this growler to help my fitness journey to track how much water I am drinking and so far I am loving it. I filled it up with ice, water and some BCAA supplements around 8am and finished drinking all of it around 6pm and it was still cold!
customer_reviews.author: Kenny

customer_reviews.title: buy two !!  lol
customer_reviews.text: well darn. I didn't realize that I wrote my review under the sleeve. sold separately. will keep your beverage cold in the sun all day !! I use in the convertible and out by the pool. more cost effective doing a better job than "name brand" sold separately. washes easily. I use it for water but I would think with stainless steel there would be no lingering odors. so worth it !!
customer_reviews.author: Red 4rd

customer_reviews.title: Good bottle.  Holds enough to make you pee ALOT!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good bottle. Keeps stuff cold for quite a while. I like it but it is too big to drink from one handed if that's what you want for driving. Only bad thing for me so far is that the ring holding the cap on is cracked and will broken through before too long. Doesn't really bother me but be nice if it would have lasted longer than a week. I'll probobaly buy a smaller one that can be drank from while driving
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME company and a GREAT product
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME company and a GREAT product. The lid to ours broke after dropping it when full of water (the lid is plastic), the company replaced the whole thing free of charge and without hassle. Would recommend to anyone looking for a large/double insulated bottle. Keeps drink cold/hot all day.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah

customer_reviews.title: Great Piece of Gear
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint for the bottle is that I wish it was taller vice wider to make it easier to hold with one hand. Other than that minor complaint, I love it and have been telling all my friends about it. It works just as advertised, I took it out to the soccer fields with my son on a 90 degree day and not only was the water in it cold there was still plenty of ice even after two hours of sitting in the sun. I usually don't write product reviews, but I do on the things that I really like and the 45 Degree Latitude is awesome and I highly recommend it. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: scott mabee

customer_reviews.text: Hands down the most legit water bottle I've ever had. Me and the wife drink a TON of water and always had issues with it getting warm before we were done with the bottle. Warm water is fine but this thing keeps your water the SAME temperature as when you put it in, all day. Also the size is perfect for me to take to work and just use it all day, instead of using 5-6 plastic water bottles. Great solution for everything we needed.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah B

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t say enough good things about this growler. The price alone is incredibly inexpensive especially in comparison to what a 64oz growler costs everywhere else. It keeps my water cold for 24-48 hours depending on the condition of weather. It’s durable and it doesn’t have a gross metal taste like some growlers do. I highly recommend purchasing this thing. You won’t find a better deal anywhere else.
customer_reviews.author: MoodyCoder

customer_reviews.title: Effective!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these so that I could take my large dogs hiking over the summer and have enough (cool) water for all of us. They are great. They keep water COLD for hours in really hot temperatures, don't leak, and are very durable. Being stainless steel, they've quite heavy if you intend to carry them far, but I expected that. I highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: megathon

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great value compared to pricey bottles that are basically the same. The one thing I was disappointed about was I was expecting the bottle to have the alcohol warning on it so I can use as a growler, but mine didn't. NBD though! I mostly use it for water anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: This bottle is Awesome! It has kept my water ice cold all day and overnight. I even dropped it and only the slightest scratch, if I hadn't known it was dropped I'd never have even noticed it, in fact it's hard for me to find now.
customer_reviews.author: pvdela

customer_reviews.title: Great container! I use it for water everyday
customer_reviews.text: Great container! I use it for water everyday. It's keeps the water cold forever. Even on hot days. I only gave it 4 stars because it didn't come with a drinking straw top. I had to find one that fits from an outside company. If it came with a top you could drink directly from it would be perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Raven O.

customer_reviews.title: Great build quality to refill a with beer.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to refill with beer on local brewery nearby. Build quality is great and kept the beer colder for a little more time than glass growler.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel V

customer_reviews.title: Get a carrier or handle
customer_reviews.text: I am a female of average stature, and this bottle is quite large for me. I need two hands to hold it. I expected as much, based on the dimensions offered. My suggestion is to get a handle or holder or carry case for this item. Once you fill it with liquid, the weight greatly increases, and it can be a little cumbersome to tote around without a carrier or handle of some sorts. Other than that great bottle so far!
customer_reviews.author: P

customer_reviews.title: Great bottle for holding cold fluids on reserve
customer_reviews.text: This bottle is the best I have found for keeping fluids cold for at least 20 hours. At 64 oz this is perfect for having cold water available to drink at my work. As water on tap that is filtered is not dorectly in ny department. It holds 4 cups worth and fits my needs. The top seals and keeps the water in with no leaks. Great price for a premium bottle.
customer_reviews.author: A. G. Lopez

customer_reviews.title: This growler works with my TrailKeg beer dispensing cap
customer_reviews.text: This growler works great. I ordered it so I could use it with my TrailKeg beer dispensing cap. The cap must fit very well so the growler can be pressurized with CO2 so the beer can be kept fresh and allow it to be dispensed through a tap. The 45 Degree growler worked perfectly. I tried another company's growler but my TrailKeg cap would not screw on properly so I returned it and ordered the 45 Degree growler and I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kailua Al

customer_reviews.title: Buy This Growler
customer_reviews.text: The best thing i have bought in a long time. Great for every occasion, from beach days, camping, work, and road trips. Every liquid i put in this stays cold for a long time and the quality is as good or better than Hydroflask. Good Job Guys!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Disappointed...  Drip Drip Drip.....
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for 6 weeks but now leaking. And I have made sure I have it closed as tight as I can and it still drip drips.. Pretty Disappointed..
customer_reviews.author: Kuroth

customer_reviews.title: Better than advertised
customer_reviews.text: Works better than advertised. Inside test after 63 hours still had a baseball size chunk of ice left. Outside test had half a baseball size chunk of ice after 48 hours. Outside was sitting on shaded patio, direct sun in mornings, shade rest of day. First day high was 88 degrees, second day high was 95 degrees.
customer_reviews.author: RH2300

customer_reviews.title: the contents inside were still nice and cold
customer_reviews.text: I have had this bottle for a few days and I'm liking it so far. It delivers on its promise; keeping drinks cold all day. I left the bottle in a warm car all day today while at work and came back to find while the outside of the bottle was warm, the contents inside were still nice and cold. The cap feels sturdy and secure, and the bottle feels well made. I wish it came in other colors: the black feels like it gets pretty hot in the sun, but since the inside stays cool it's not a big problem.
customer_reviews.author: sreece

customer_reviews.title: Really Nice Modern Water Container
customer_reviews.text: Very nice stainless steel water container. Modern design, keeps water cold. Well built. Great value based on similar containers. Good customer service follow-up to ensure happy buyer. Will buy more! Don't forget the cool neoprene carry sleve. Cool!
customer_reviews.author: C. Tipton

customer_reviews.title: Love it..
customer_reviews.text: Just as described. I take to Disney all the time. Fill it with Ice water in the morning and refill at water fountains through out the day. Can keep me with cold water all day.
customer_reviews.author: Randall Owen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for PT
customer_reviews.text: I was going to purchase a hydroflask, but decided I would try this one instead as the price seemed reasonable. My husband loves it, he goes on hikes, and does a lot of PT for work. This flask keeps his water cold after a whole days work!
customer_reviews.author: CALI

customer_reviews.title: Will keep ice
customer_reviews.text: Excellent choice. Filled it with ice and tea the next day still had ice. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Great for a day but cleaning is useless and has smell that sticks if you put any besides water.
customer_reviews.text: Great for a day but cleaning is useless and has smell that sticks if you put any besides water.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a 64oz flask that’ll keep my water super cold throughout the day. Super helpful if you’re trying to drink the healthy amount of water a person should be drinking a day which is 64oz! I can take it anywhere and it’s just perfect it’s HUGE!
customer_reviews.author: Betsy ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable customer service, i broke the top and emailed ...
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable customer service,i broke the top and emailed them to see if I could purchase another, instead they sent me a free one, no charge. The product is as described as well, very well made,i put some ice in with my water and it was still ice after 2 days.
customer_reviews.author: David Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Too bad! The doc said he needs to drink the ...
customer_reviews.text: It was just what I needed for my husband. He complained about it being 64oz. Too bad! The doc said he needs to drink the daily amount. After a week of use he has become ONE with his 40 degree latitude. It was a good deal and works just as well as the hydro flask.
customer_reviews.author: VM+3

customer_reviews.title: Do not Buy!!! You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: The cap broke after 2 months of use and now after five months of use, there is a water sound between the inner and outer wall. Definitely spend a little more on a Hydroflask as they last forever.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: This item had rusting on the mouth of the growler ...
customer_reviews.text: This item had rusting on the mouth of the growler upon opening. I've tried to clean it off but overall it won't come off and I'm worried it will continue to rust until it is unusable.
customer_reviews.author: James T. Kirkwood

customer_reviews.title: Great product very happy!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! I work construction so im in the sun all day and need to drink about a half gallon of water a day. Up until this point I've been buying half gallon water jugs for work every week refilling it daily. By about 10 am every day my water is warm and by the end of the week it tastes like plastic. Now with my 45 lattitude growler my water stays COLD ALL DAY! with or without ice. The growler is comfortable to drink out of cold and it tastes great! I am a very happy costumer! This purchase is 100% worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect - quality control could be better...
customer_reviews.text: The growler does what all the reviews say - it keeps everything cold for over a day. Ice water from the previous day always last all the next day. The size is great for me, it's easy to carry around the powder coating matte black is great. I use the 10 inch silicone straws with it, which just barely clear the top, but the great thing is you can close the top with the straw in it. All in all, a very good product. The only negative is quality control - the printing on mine is smeared and rubbed off in places. Doesn't detract from the overall quality of the container, just a little disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: BuddyB

customer_reviews.title: Great water bottle
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for my dad, and he loves it. Keeps drinks the same temperature you put them in as for close to 5 or 6 hours, and even longer if you have ice in there. Left it in his car in the hot southern california sun for an 8 hour day at work and still had ice in it when he got back, despite being too hot to grab on the outside. Great water bottle, great for bringing craft beer home as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product very well made
customer_reviews.text: It really is everything that they say and more. Excellent product and very well made keeps ice for days, i never need to drink warm water ever again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: I am not generally a water drinker, but I wanted to be, and this definitely helped. It is heavy duty and high quality. Water stays cold for hours and hours and there is no sweating. The flat mate exterior is gorgeous and makes me feel sophisticated! I am thinking of buying a smaller one for when I am on the go.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Hefley

customer_reviews.title: No chill
customer_reviews.text: Loved the look and feel but was sad to find out it didn't keep cold like expected. Ice would last for about 4 hours of lucky. I know it is Beer Growler but seen people were using it for water as well. Work on flight line and would find ice was melted few hours after into the work day even on cool days.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love it. Only comment
customer_reviews.text: This product works exceptionally well. Absolutely no complaints. Cold stays cold, hot stays hot long time , love it. Only comment, I would like to have a handle for pouring easier.
customer_reviews.author: Delineator

customer_reviews.title: I love this water bottle
customer_reviews.text: I love this water bottle. It truly keeps my water cold all day. What's even better, is the company is so easy to work with. I dropped the bottle and broke the lid. I emailed them to see if I could get a replacement lid and they wrote me back within a few hours and got the lid sent the next day! They truly stand behind their product.
customer_reviews.author: Moira K.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and Almost as Good as Other Brands
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't keep things as cold as my Hydroflask, but I do live in a very hot climate and putting in a few ice cubes will keep drinks cold all day. Considering this is MUCH cheaper than hydroflask (or any other brand),, it's totally worth it to me. Seems great quality and super easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: naturalmama

customer_reviews.title: This is a Great product, it feels great and holds plenty of ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a Great product, it feels great and holds plenty of water. I also bought the sleeve for it (same company) because it really is a big bottle, and the sleeve helps a lot with the gripping. I love the craftsmanship of this bottle, and you can tell that it will last you a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Gibran

customer_reviews.title: This is an amazing bottle. It came right on time and is ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing bottle. It came right on time and is exactly as described. I am so thankful to have a great bottle that will keep drinks cool for such a long period of time. I would recommend this to anyone!.
customer_reviews.author: LP

customer_reviews.title: Its a growler but I use it for water and I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this growler though I should admit that I've never actually used it for beer. It's currently my daily carry device for staying hydrated with water. It keeps the water very cold all day long. It works so well in fact, that I need to use less ice with it. The mouth is wide so it allows you to chug water on the go.
customer_reviews.author: BigPapaGato

customer_reviews.title: Ice cold, even in high temps!
customer_reviews.text: I initially went with the 45 Degree Latitude bottle over the competitors because of the price. However, the quality of this product is high, keeps contents at temperature for a LONG time! I live in Phoenix, AZ - the average high in the summer is 110+ degrees. I needed something that would keep liquids ice cold when I'm by the pool, doing the lawn or even playing sports. Thank you 45 degree for delivering a great product at a fair price!
customer_reviews.author: David A Quaid

customer_reviews.title: I love the 64 oz bottle
customer_reviews.text: It is very well made looks good and it is practical, I would like to see the screw on cap that is made out of plastic to be made out of the same metal as the 64 container. The reason for this is that this container can become my primary water, cooking, boiling and carry all in one unit that I should use to put in a fire to heat up food and water. If you don't have one that can do all this you should consider designing one you would be on top of your game
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Perfect beach drink container!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this solely for beach drinking and it does not disappoint! I only drink mixed drinks so I bring my booze and mixers. I fill this container up with ice then just mix and refresh the drinks all day. This will keep ice the entire day while sitting in the 90 degree sun. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Had for over a year. No rust. Do, however, need a brush to clean it well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: White powder coat logo fades after a couple months, but works perfectly & keeps fluids hot & cold for 24 hours as advertised
customer_reviews.author: Logic

customer_reviews.title: Nicely insulated
customer_reviews.text: Wish I had a different lid option for drinking out off. Hard to take to gym.
customer_reviews.author: Hanson

customer_reviews.title: I really enjoyed the quality of the product
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed the quality of the product, and the excellent price. I work 12 hour shifts, and have ice cold water all day. Even if the growler is inside of a hot vehicle the water remains ice cold.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: It's a nice big reminder to carry around
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my water cold and encourages me to drink all the water my body needs. It's a nice big reminder to carry around. ;) I use a carbineer to attach it to my laptop bag. Most importantly, it does not leak like all my other large water bottles.
customer_reviews.author: S. Cragar

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love at first site! I'm constantly on the go. And I'm in love with water. However, I can not seem to ever stomach warm or room temperature water. This bottle comes in handy!! I have my water for hours and my water remains cold even hours later! This is a awesome and genius idea.
customer_reviews.author: Hawk

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great water bottle. Keeps ice for a very long time! I just ordered another one because I love the one I already have so much!
customer_reviews.author: n1121

customer_reviews.title: If you're looking for an insulated growler, this is a good one to buy.
customer_reviews.text: This product was exactly as described. I "tested" the 12-hour hot beverage claim when I got the growler using boiling water in a room temperature setting. 12 hours later, the water was indeed still hot. An additional 12 hours (24 hours total) later the water was still well above ambient temperature. In real-world testing, this will keep my coffee hot for much longer than it takes me to drink it. Excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my son who drinks one gallon of water ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my son who drinks one gallon of water a day, and carries this with him. No worries about plastic leaching or foul tasting water.
customer_reviews.author: The Grunaus

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my husband, and he LOVES it! We haven't tested the 24 hour claim yet, but our beer definitely stayed cold for 6 hours. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: turtlesrule

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this half gallon bottle. Keeps drinks ice cold or hot for over 24 hrs. great for long hikes and camping or for just drinking water all day!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The drink stays cold all day
customer_reviews.text: I really like this brand. I've already bought several bottles. It keeps the drink cold all day.
customer_reviews.author: Eliane Pereira

customer_reviews.title: GREAT bottle!
customer_reviews.text: I was super impressed with this bottle. Great quality! It felt like it should have cost more than the $16 that I paid for it. My wife said she wanted one too after she saw it. Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Brown

customer_reviews.title: Good Water Canteen
customer_reviews.text: It definitely can store a lot of liquids, and is sturdy to boot, but can be difficult to handle unless using two hands due to its huge size. Could be better with either a grip area or handle for single hand use.
customer_reviews.author: Logan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome. I have left this in my car during ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. I have left this in my car during the summer and have come out the next day to see that there is still ice inside. Can't go wrong with this item.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product, the cap cracked and they replaced it for me, highly recommend getting these. My son uses them going out on construction sites.
customer_reviews.author: KODA

customer_reviews.title: Very happy!
customer_reviews.text: I love my bottle ! I got the 64 oz and I couldn't be happier. Definitely keeps the water ice cold for 24 hours. I haven't tried hot yet but I'm sure it will do the sam.
customer_reviews.author: Javier Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Save your money...
customer_reviews.text: Used this bottle 3x per week for work and have hand washed only. I am a nurse that does 12 hour shifts. Within 2 months at this rate of usage, the plastic that attaches the lid has cracked and broken in two. Just save your money and put it towards a bottle from a more reputable brand.
customer_reviews.author: Alisha Donohoe

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. Great product keeps my water cold for several ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Great product keeps my water cold for several hours as in the description. I work six-eight hours a day and this keeps me hydrated throughout my shift. Ive had it for a week will do a follow up but fully satisfied with product.
customer_reviews.author: eliot Castillo

customer_reviews.title: works great held water with ice cold for about 24 hour ...
customer_reviews.text: works great held water with ice cold for about 24 hour have not tried with beer yet but i like it
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Love the price and the size of the growler
customer_reviews.text: Love the price and the size of the growler. Kept my water cold and refreshing. My only issue was the flat lid cap broke recently at the handle. I tried supergluing it back together but it didn't work out. I've searched online to buy a flat lid cap but no luck. I haven't had problems with my 40 oz. so I'm not sure what happened. It's still usable but not as easy to carry by the hook the lid provided.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Certainly keeps it cold!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! Similar (if not the same) products are twice the price of this and I would not rate them any better. I am amazed at how long it keeps my water cold as well. Fill it up in the morning and lasts through the evening. Very good product and great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Great stainless steal growler!
customer_reviews.text: Great product at a really fair price. It's light weight and keeps my water cold all day. Haven't used it for beer, but I'm sure it would work great for that as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: But love it!
customer_reviews.text: Keeps everything cold for hours! Haven’t tried hot liquids yet. But love it!
customer_reviews.author: pamela martin

customer_reviews.title: Leaves my beverages/water nice and cold for several hours/days Wouldn't say its the ...
customer_reviews.text: Leaves my beverages/water nice and cold for several hours/days Wouldn't say its the best you can find, but for the price I couldn't recommend anything else.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Works GREAT! My husband uses and it sits in a ...
customer_reviews.text: Works GREAT! My husband uses and it sits in a truck when its in the 90's outside. Just wish I would have ordered a different color than black.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Foster

customer_reviews.title: I drop that gets beat up and gets hit by things and it still works and looks great. It's my drink cool or at least at ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for about 3 weeks now. I work as a landscaper so it's outside and on the ground all the time. I drop that gets beat up and gets hit by things and it still works and looks great. It's my drink cool or at least at the temperature they went in at. The lid always has a good seal. Overall I think it was a great purchase and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Unfortunately the plastic lid strap cracked within ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Unfortunately the plastic lid strap cracked within a month of receiving it. Company took care of me and sent another. Received it in less than a week. Still love it and the customer service is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: I put ice in it overnight and I had no ...
customer_reviews.text: I put ice in it overnight and I had no melt off in the morning! I have a 40 oz bottle and it wasn't enough so I up graded to 64oz. Just what I needed
customer_reviews.author: ADub

customer_reviews.title: Beer Growler Leaks
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice looking beer growler, but it has a major issue. The lid on the growler leaks beer when filled and continues to lose carbonation through the threads of the cap.
customer_reviews.author: Day-Nuh

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. didnt receive the colored interchangeable bands with my order, but at least it came with the gray one which is probably the only one I'd use anyway. Had the real test yesterday when I had it out in the sun for 4 hours with just cold water and no ice. The water was still cold when I got home. Would buy another
customer_reviews.author: Brad A.

product_meta.title: 45 Degree Latitude Beer Growler, Enjoy Your Favorite Craft Beer Or IPA from The Comfort of Your Own Home, Stainless Steel Growler 64 oz - Red
feature_bullets: Fresh Beer or Water: Our leakproof design ensures that you can fill your growler with water or beer in the morning and it will stay cool all day

Double-Walled Insulation: our vacuum insulation ensures that your drink maintains its temperature for hours, if not days. Warm drinks will stay warm for more than 6 hours and cold drinks for at least 24 hours
Military Approved: We have had hundreds of service men and women write to us praising our design and how it fits into their routine just as well as the more expensive solutions
100% Satisfaction Guarantee: If you are not happy with your growler before 30 days we will give you a full refund no questions asked. Purchase this now with 0% chance of being unsatisfied
Enhanced Grip: Our bottle has a specifically designed coating to ensure maximum grip as well as catering for the large volume of liquid that it is capable of holding

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
